title: Photocatalytic nanoparticles in flow-through annular photoreactors for continuous selenate reduction in industrial wastewater
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00170B, Paper
Emile Milan, Aldrich Ngan, Jeffrey Watchorn, Zi Qi Chen, Aaron J Clasky, Frank Gu
The adverse effect of elevated selenium (Se) levels on aquatic ecosystems continues to drive the development of innovative technologies for treatment of Se-laden industrial effluents to sub-ppb levels. Photocatalysis is...
